## UserProfileService.getUserProfile() method

Beta version. Gets the user profile of a user. This operation returns an instance of 'UserProfile' type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getUserProfile(escapedUserId: string): CancelablePromise<UserProfile>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter     | Type   | Description                                                                                           |
| ------------- | ------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| escapedUserId | string | The TCM URI of the user with the colon escaped by replacing it with an underscore. E.g. "tcm_1-1-17". |

**Returns:**

[CancelablePromise](./open-api-client.cancelablepromise.md)<!-- -->&lt;[UserProfile](./open-api-client.userprofile.md)<!-- -->&gt;

UserProfile The request was successful.
